verses.text: \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w Go|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* proclaim \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*,

\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w Administer|strong="H6213"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*. \w Rescue|strong="H5337"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* victim \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w robbery|strong="H1497"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w oppressor|strong="H3238"\w*. \w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w no|strong="H6213"\w* \w wrong|strong="H3238"\w* \w or|strong="H3068"\w* \w violence|strong="H2554"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w foreigner|strong="H1616"\w*, \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, \w or|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* widow. \w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*: “\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w summit|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*; \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w turn|strong="H7896"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*, \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w uninhabited|strong="H3427"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* ask \w one|strong="H6213"\w* \w another|strong="H7453"\w*, ‘\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w such|strong="H2063"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w thing|strong="H2063"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*?’

\w Then|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5800"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* reply, ‘\w Because|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w worshiped|strong="H7812"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w* other gods.’” A Warning about Shallum

Do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w weep|strong="H1058"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* king; do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w mourn|strong="H5110"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* loss. \w Weep|strong="H1058"\w* \w bitterly|strong="H1058"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H4191"\w* exiled, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w native|strong="H4138"\w* land.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w* \w concerning|strong="H3068"\w* \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w* \f + \fr 22:11 \ft Shallum was also called Jehoahaz.\f* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w succeeded|strong="H8478"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w gone|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*: “\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*,

\w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w which|strong="H8033"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H4725"\w* \w exiled|strong="H1540"\w*; \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w land|strong="H4725"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w*.” A Warning about Jehoiakim

“\w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w who|strong="H3808"\w* \w builds|strong="H1129"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* \w by|strong="H5414"\w* \w unrighteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w upper|strong="H5944"\w* \w rooms|strong="H5944"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*, \w who|strong="H3808"\w* \w makes|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* countrymen \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w pay|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* fails \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w pay|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w wages|strong="H6467"\w*,

\w Does|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* excel \f + \fr 22:15 \ft Or because you enclose yourself\f* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* cedar? \w Did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* father \w have|strong="H3588"\w* food \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*? \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w administered|strong="H6213"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* went \w well|strong="H2896"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* took \w up|strong="H1847"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w cause|strong="H1779"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w needy|strong="H6041"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w went|strong="H3068"\w* \w well|strong="H2896"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w*. \w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w what|strong="H2896"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* means \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H1847"\w* \w Me|strong="H3808"\w*?” \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

“\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w set|strong="H6213"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* nothing \w except|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w own|strong="H5869"\w* \w dishonest|strong="H1215"\w* \w gain|strong="H1215"\w*, \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w shedding|strong="H8210"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w practicing|strong="H6213"\w* \w extortion|strong="H6233"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w oppression|strong="H6233"\w*.”

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w* \w concerning|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*: “\w They|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w mourn|strong="H5594"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H4428"\w*: ‘\w Alas|strong="H1945"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* brother! \w Alas|strong="H1945"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* sister!’ \w They|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w mourn|strong="H5594"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H4428"\w*: ‘\w Alas|strong="H1945"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* master! \w Alas|strong="H1945"\w*, \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w splendor|strong="H1935"\w*!’

\w He|strong="H3389"\w* \w will|strong="H3389"\w* \w be|strong="H3389"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w donkey|strong="H2543"\w*, \w dragged|strong="H5498"\w* \w away|strong="H7993"\w* \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w thrown|strong="H7993"\w* \w outside|strong="H1973"\w* \w the|strong="H7993"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w Go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w cry|strong="H6817"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w*; \w raise|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w in|strong="H7665"\w* \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*; \w cry|strong="H6817"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w Abarim|strong="H5682"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* lovers \w have|strong="H5414"\w* \w been|strong="H5927"\w* \w crushed|strong="H7665"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w will|strong="H7307"\w* drive \w away|strong="H3212"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* lovers \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w into|strong="H3212"\w* \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*. \w Then|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w be|strong="H7451"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H3637"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w humiliated|strong="H3637"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*,\f + \fr 22:23 \ft That is, the palace in Jerusalem; see 1 Kings 7:2.\f* nestled \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* cedars, \w how|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w will|strong="H4100"\w* \w groan|strong="H2603"\w* \w when|strong="H3427"\w* \w pangs|strong="H2256"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w anguish|strong="H2427"\w* \w come|strong="H3205"\w* \w upon|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w*, \w agony|strong="H2427"\w* \w like|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w woman|strong="H3205"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w labor|strong="H3205"\w*.” A Warning to Coniah
